definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations
to defame/to libel/to defile/to smear/to vilify
shameful/scandalous/to be humiliated/to make a fool of sb or oneself/to make sb lose face
lit. family shames must not be spread abroad (idiom)/fig. don't wash your dirty linen in public
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 yang2

sentences.english: He is not handsome but ugly.
Honestly, this one looks a little ugly.
sentences.chinese: 坦白講，這個看起來有點醜。

sentences.english: The baby's less ugly than you.
But he said that the works were ugly like Hongshan culture.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他卻說“要‘醜’得像紅山文化”。

sentences.english: When the age of Ugly philosophy approaches, the breakthrough first happens in literature.
sentences.chinese: 醜學時代來臨時，最先在文藝領域找到了突破口。

sentences.english: Despising herself for being so ugly, my mother would leave herself alone.
sentences.chinese: 因爲醜，自慚形穢的母親一向都是孤獨和寂寞的。

sentences.english: B. Which script or platform you'll be using to build the site.
sentences.chinese: 醜腳本或平臺，您將使用創建的網站。

sentences.english: In short, the aesthetic thoughts of modern calligraphy are the self-development of ugliness.
sentences.chinese: 一言概之，現代書法的審美理想是“醜”的自我演變。

sentences.english: The two ugly stepsisters try on the shoe, but their feet are too big.
sentences.chinese: 兩個醜姊姊試穿這隻鞋，不過她們的腳太大了。

sentences.english: He changed his horse when he saw the ugly girl.
sentences.chinese: 他看見那個醜姑娘就掉轉馬頭。

sentences.english: In Love Story, whom I acted is only a clown.
sentences.chinese: 在愛情的故事裏，我扮演的只是一個尐醜。

sentences.english: The book is like a silent world, let me discern good and evil, the United States, ugly.
sentences.chinese: 書像一個無聲的世界，讓我辨清善，惡，美，醜。

sentences.english: Who is so ugly? Nobody knows.
sentences.chinese: 誰像我這幅醜模樣？沒人知來沒人講。

sentences.english: I put my head down and bury my face iny stupid clown-sweater arms.
sentences.chinese: 我低下頭，把頭埋進穿着笨蛋醜毛衣的胳膊裏。

sentences.english: Your clothes conceal much of your beauty, yet they hide not the unbeautiful.
sentences.chinese: 你們的衣服遮掩了你們許多的美，卻不能遮蓋住醜。

sentences.english: If you weren't so ugly it would lift itself.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不這麼醜的話，它會自動舉起來的。

definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
